entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING, Ulukhaktok
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 8:04 a.m. MDT Wednesday 3 May 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of freezing rain mixed with snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this afternoon. Periods of freezing rain or snow beginning this afternoon. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 50 gusting to 70 this afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 11 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Wednesday 3 May 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow or rain. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing rain or snow mixed with rain changing to rain or snow this evening then to snow late this evening. Blowing snow at times overnight. Rainfall amount 5 mm. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind east 50 km/h gusting to 70 becoming southeast 20 near midnight then west 40 gusting to 60. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Wednesday 3 May 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow at times in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 13. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Wednesday 3 May 2023
